class.name: wxPropertyGrid
class.description:
wxPropertyGrid is a specialized grid for editing properties - in other words name = value pairs.

List of ready-to-use property classes include strings, numbers, flag sets, fonts, colours and many others. It is possible, for example, to categorize properties, set up a complete tree-hierarchy, add more than two columns, and set arbitrary per-property attributes.

Please note that most member functions are inherited and as such not documented on this page. This means you will probably also want to read wxPropertyGridInterface class reference.

See also wxPropertyGrid Overview.

type.name: EVT_PG_SELECTED
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_SELECTED event, generated when a property selection has been changed, either by user action or by indirect program function. For instance, collapsing a parent property programmatically causes any selected child property to become unselected, and may therefore cause this event to be generated.

type.name: EVT_PG_CHANGED
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_CHANGED event, generated when property value has been changed by the user.

type.name: EVT_PG_CHANGING
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_CHANGING event, generated when property value is about to be changed by user. Use wxPropertyGridEvent::GetValue() to take a peek at the pending value, and wxPropertyGridEvent::Veto() to prevent change from taking place, if necessary.

type.name: EVT_PG_HIGHLIGHTED
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_HIGHLIGHTED event, which occurs when mouse moves over a property. Event's property is NULL if hovered area does not belong to any property.

type.name: EVT_PG_RIGHT_CLICK
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_RIGHT_CLICK event, which occurs when property is clicked on with right mouse button.

type.name: EVT_PG_DOUBLE_CLICK
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_DOUBLE_CLICK event, which occurs when property is double-clicked on with left mouse button.

type.name: EVT_PG_ITEM_COLLAPSED
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_ITEM_COLLAPSED event, generated when user collapses a property or category.

type.name: EVT_PG_ITEM_EXPANDED
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_ITEM_EXPANDED event, generated when user expands a property or category.

type.name: EVT_PG_LABEL_EDIT_BEGIN
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_LABEL_EDIT_BEGIN event, generated when user is about to begin editing a property label. You can veto this event to prevent the action.

type.name: EVT_PG_LABEL_EDIT_ENDING
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_LABEL_EDIT_ENDING event, generated when user is about to end editing of a property label. You can veto this event to prevent the action.

type.name: EVT_PG_COL_BEGIN_DRAG
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_COL_BEGIN_DRAG event, generated when user starts resizing a column - can be vetoed.

type.name: EVT_PG_COL_DRAGGING
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_COL_DRAGGING, event, generated when a column resize by user is in progress. This event is also generated when user double-clicks the splitter in order to recenter it.

type.name: EVT_PG_COL_END_DRAG
type.description: Respond to wxEVT_PG_COL_END_DRAG event, generated after column resize by user has finished.
